Name: palmoplantar keratoderma and congenital alopecia 1
Definition: An ectodermal dysplasia characterized by autosomal dominant inheritance of severe hyperkeratosis

Name: palmoplantar keratoderma and congenital alopecia 2
Definition: An ectodermal dysplasia characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance of alopecia

Name: dermatopathia pigmentosa reticularis
Definition: An ectodermal dysplasia characterized by reticulate hyperpigmentation

Name: Clouston syndrome
Definition: An osteochondrodysplasia that has_material_basis_in abnormal cartilage development due to mutations in the SLC26A2 gene which results_in short limb dwarfism.

Name: hypohidrotic ectodermal dysplasia
Definition: An ectodermal dysplasia that is characterized by malformation of ectodermal (skin

Name: Papillon-Lefevre disease
Definition: An ectodermal dysplasia that is characterized by palmoplantar keratoderma associated with early-onset periodontitis and has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the cathepsin C gene on chromosome 11q14.
